column5: Just watched the 2011 Version of The Thing.  Not as good as the 1982 Version, but I could not believe how much one of the actors looked like one of our very own OFC'rs  Clive (Fishing Fury)    Actor Kristofer Hivju     Post any if you know any
Actually, it's funny you should put Drew's pic here.  If you've ever watched Untold Stories of the ER, there is a male nurse/doctor that looks just like him, but I can't find a picture of him.
I know if I had redheaded triplets I'd have separated them too.  I can think of a few separated at births but they might start another "fishing fight".
sweet chuckle. and yes joey the original was the best. I believe it was produced in blk/white.
